summary: This is an internal email from July 9, 2019, notifying that the FBI's NY VCAC squad (C-20) has converted the Jeffrey Epstein case (31E-NY-3027571) to a 'crisis case' to aid in information management and established a tipline at the national call center, with IA assisting in Sentinel workflow setup.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email refers to the FBI case '31E-NY-3027571' as 'the Jeffrey Epstein case,' indicating he is the central subject of the investigation being escalated to a crisis case.

events.title: Epstein Case Converted to FBI Crisis Case
events.description: The FBI's New York VCAC squad (C-20) converted case 31E-NY-3027571, the Jeffrey Epstein case, to a 'crisis case' to aid in information management and established a tipline at the national call center.

keyFacts: The FBI's New York VCAC squad (C-20) converted the Jeffrey Epstein investigation (case 31E-NY-3027571) to a 'crisis case' on or before July 9, 2019.
A national tipline was established at the FBI's national call center as part of the crisis case management.
The FBI's Inspection Division (IA) was assisting the squad in establishing roles and workflows in Sentinel, the FBI's case management system.
The email indicates a significant escalation and formalization of the FBI's investigative response to the Epstein case in July 2019.
